mapper.select: select id, title, content, team_id, commit_time, check_time from pending_task where check_mark = '1' and author_id = #{id} order by check_time DESC
select id, title, content, team_id, commit_time, check_time, reason from pending_task where check_mark = '2' and author_id = #{id} order by check_time DESC

select pending_task.id, pending_task.author_id, student.name author_name, pending_task.title, pending_task.content, pending_task.team_id, attachment.id attachment_id, pending_task.commit_time from pending_task left join student on pending_task.author_id = student.id left join attachment on pending_task.id = attachment.rely_on_id where pending_task.author_id = #{studentId} and pending_task.check_mark = '0'

select pending_task.id, pending_task.author_id, student.name author_name, pending_task.title, pending_task.content, pending_task.team_id, attachment.id attachment_id, pending_task.commit_time from pending_task left join student on pending_task.author_id = student.id left join attachment on pending_task.id = attachment.rely_on_id left join team on team.id = pending_task.team_id where team.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and pending_task.check_mark = '0'
